verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H9201>when<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%> had <S%H8552>finished<s%> <S%H5674>crossing<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Take<s%> for yourselves <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H376>men<s%> from the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H7626>tribe,<s%>

and <S%H6680>command<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5375>'Take<s%> up for yourselves <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> from <S%H2088>here<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> from the <S%H4673>place<s%> <S%H4673>where<s%> the priests' <S%H7272>feet<s%> are <S%H4673>standing<s%> <S%H3559>firm,<s%> and <S%H5674>carry<s%> them <S%H5674>over<s%> with you, and <S%H5117>lay<s%> them <S%H5117>down<s%> in the <S%H4411>lodging<s%> <S%H4411>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you will <S%H3885>lodge<s%> <S%H3915>tonight.<s%>' "

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H3559>appointed<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H7626>tribe;<s%>

and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H5674>"Cross<s%> <S%H6440>again<s%> to the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> into the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> of you <S%H7311>take<s%> up a <S%H68>stone<s%> on his <S%H7926>shoulder,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"Let <S%H2088>this<s%> be a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you, so that when your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H4279>later,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>'What<s%> do <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> mean to you?'

then you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H834>'Because<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> were <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> when it <S%H5674>crossed<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> were <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off.<s%>' So <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%> "

And <S%H3651>thus<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did,<s%> as <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> up <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> from the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they <S%H5674>carried<s%> them <S%H5674>over<s%> with them to the <S%H4411>lodging<s%> <S%H4411>place,<s%> and <S%H5117>put<s%> them <S%H5117>down<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6965>set<s%> up <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at the <S%H4673>place<s%> <S%H8478><s%> <S%H4673>where<s%> the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> were <S%H4673>standing,<s%> and they are <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> were <S%H5975>standing<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> was <S%H8552>completed<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4116>hurried<s%> and <S%H5674>crossed;<s%>

and it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H9201>when<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> had <S%H8552>finished<s%> <S%H5674>crossing,<s%> that the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> in <S%H2571>battle<s%> <S%H2571>array<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to them;

about 40000, <S%H9139>equipped<s%> for <S%H6635>war,<s%> <S%H5674>crossed<s%> for <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to the <S%H6160>desert<s%> <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

On that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1431>exalted<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> so that they <S%H3372>revered<s%> him, <S%H9201>just<s%> as they had <S%H3372>revered<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H9132>life.<s%>
Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%>
<S%H6680>"Command<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> that they <S%H5927>come<s%> up from the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>"
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5927>"Come<s%> up from the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H5375>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H5927>come<s%> up from the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of the priests' <S%H7272>feet<s%> were <S%H5423>lifted<s%> up to the <S%H2724>dry<s%> <S%H2724>ground,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to their <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H1415>banks<s%> as <S%H8543>before.<s%> <S%H8032><s%>

Now the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up from the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> on the <S%H4217>eastern<s%> <S%H7097>edge<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6965>set<s%> up at <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>"When<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> their fathers in <S%H1>time<s%> to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H4279>saying,<s%> <S%H559>'What<s%> are <S%H4100>these<s%> <S%H428>stones<s%>?'

then you shall <S%H3045>inform<s%> your <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3478>'Israel<s%> <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H3004>ground.<s%>'

"For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3001>dried<s%> up the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H5704>until<s%> you had <S%H5674>crossed,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H3001>dried<s%> up <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> us <S%H5704>until<s%> we had <S%H5674>crossed;<s%>

that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2389>mighty,<s%> <S%H4616>so<s%> that you may <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3605>forever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%> "
